item.title: Activities
item.description: CSTAD also provided activity for each students twice a year. Those activity are sport day, Happy Khmer New Year party, road trip,..

item.title: Monthly Test
item.description: On Monday, October 30, 2023, CSTAD conducted the monthly examination for October 2023. The exam took 2 hours which consisted of Java and Web Design. The exam was conducted with accuracy and transparency. It should also be noted that in order to promote ICT Development aligned with the strategic plan of the Government, as well as the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, CSTAD has been teaching and providing 50 more IT scholarships for the academic year 2024. 11 months of specialized courses in Data Analytics, DevOps Engineering, Spring Advanced, Cyber ​​Security, Flutter Mobile Development. Besides the professional for IT scholarship training, CSTAD also provide another IT Fundamental Scholarship for 4 months training for 50 students on the basic training such as Java Programming ,Git ,Database essential ,Web Design, Software Development life Cycle, Final project

item.title: http://127.0.0.1:5500/asset/Image/test.jpg
item.description: November 17, 2023, Center of Science and Technology Advanced Development (CSTAD) hosted a workshop to share experiences about A Journey from Data Class to Data Career to all scholarship students of CSTAD with guidance and advice from Mr. Prem Leapheng who is a Data Scientist & Machine Learning. Throughout the program, there is a sharing of research methods, problem solving and preparation to the journey of this sector and skill. In addition, there are also a lot of questions from students with detailed explanations from the speaker as well. It should also be noted that the Center of Science and Technology Advanced Development not only provides IT professional scholarship training to Cambodian students but also connects all students to a good career and the opportunity to study abroad.

item.name: Java Programming
item.description: This course will provide you with in-depth knowledge on how to build applications on the cloud. This program will help you learn the best practices for deploying SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS applications on Server. Master DevOps tools to automate and improve the overall efficiency and delivery of software applications.
